CONFIGURATION.WOUND_PREV_TEXT: Set the maximum time the patient is allowed to spend without any positioning movement of his or her own. You will be informed when the period has elapsed without movement.
CONFIGURATION.WOUND_PREVENTION_P1: Diese Funktion kontrolliert die Bewegung der pflegebedürftigen Person im Liegen. Sie können ein Zeitintervall zw. 15 und 360 Minuten je nach Dekubitusrisiko einstellen. Sie werden informiert, wenn dieses Interval ohne ausreichende Eigenbewegung verstrichen ist (>30°).
CONFIGURATION.FALL_PREV_TIME_INTERVAL_TEXT: If you only want to be informed during certain periods of time, you can set the time at which fall prevention is active. If you do not enter a time, the function is always activated (24 hours a day).
CONFIGURATION.FALL_PREV_TEXT_P1: You will be informed if the care after a Liegephase (> 15 minutes) the erection of the Determines upper body, for example, for a nocturnal toilet.
CONFIGURATION.FALL_PREV_TEXT_P2: You can adjust whether the function is around  the clock (24 hours) or just for one certain period should be active.
CONFIGURATION.FALL_DETECTION_TEXT: Please select one of the following options
CONFIGURATION.FALL_DETECTION_TEXT_P1: This feature informs you when the care detects a fall.
CONFIGURATION.FALL_DETECTION_TEXT_P2: You can adjust if you have any falls want to be informed, or just about falls, according to which the affected person within 2 minutes can not get up, or just over Falls after which the person lies motionless remains.
CONFIGURATION._PROTOCOL_TEXT_P1: This feature records how much time the person in need of lying, sitting, Standing and walking spend.
CONFIGURATION._PROTOCOL_TEXT_P2: The evaluation provides information about the current Level of physical activity and its Course.
CONFIGURATION.VIRTUAL_ZONES_TEXT_P1: With this feature you can save up to 4 virtual Set up zones. The configuration of the zones must be done via the care.management.
CONFIGURATION.VIRTUAL_ZONES_TEXT_P2: You will receive information if one Zone boundary was exceeded - and one Alarm when the supervised person outside all zones.
CONFIGURATION.VIRTUAL_ZONES_TEXT_P3: NOTE! Activating this function leads to increased energy consumption!
CONFIGURATION.PositionTrackingActivePopup: You are only allowed to use this function activate if you owned an informed Agreement, one Care, one Precautionary power or one Resolution of one Guardianship court are
CONFIGURATION.POSITION_TRACKING_TEXT: With this function you can get the current whereabouts of the person being cared for show.
CONFIGURATION.WEARING_TEXT: If this feature is enabled, you will informed as soon as the care for longer than 15 Seconds loses body contact.
CONFIGURATION.BATTERY_TEXT_P2: You will be informed when the remaining term of the care falls below 20% and you get one Alarm as soon as the capacity falls below 10%.
